metadata.title: CVE-2022-23825 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Aliases in the branch predictor may cause some AMD processors to predictthe wrong branch type potentially leading to information disclosure.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
